评论详情: Screenshot Clothing offers surprisingly fresh, casual, and comfortable styles with excellent sizing. As a petite guy (waist 28-29, H: 5’5”), I find their small size truly fits like a small—unlike the inflated sizing often seen in American brands today.  In a market where XS has virtually disappeared, and ‘small’ now resembles a medium, Screenshot stands out by providing accurate, well-proportioned sizes that fit comfortably without the baggy, oversized feel of today’s typical Small. Beyond their unique, funky style, this brand ensures clothing feels right and fits perfectly. A HUGE fan, I only desire that I could afford more of them.
Bought for my son for Christmas. I like the quality of the material. Nicely made. Flattering and comfortable. I also like the color. Love this company and recommend the items they have to offer.

At this point, I’m expecting a brand ambassador letter in the mail. Amazing outfits, you wouldn’t regret it.

Overall, good quality. The gray side, however, is much wider than the blue leg. There is also a fitment difference across styles. The large in this style didn't shrink to fit as proper as another style I bought even though the material is the same.

Cons: fabric pills after a few washes, so the quality doesn't last.  Pros: everything else.  I got the purple sweatpants size small for my boy who's very tall for his age, so he can wear men's smalls. I'm impressed with the embroidery! At first I thought it was just a cheap ploy, but it's really on there! And the print is all right. It's not the traditional screen print where it sits in the fabric and feels like it's a part of the product. It's slapped on but it doesn't feel too bad. My kid loves it! It's his favorite pants and he goes to school in them and even though we have a code, they still allow these pants. I'm sure as long as I don't buy the teddy bear skull (even though I really want to) he can wear these around where ever he goes. What a fun pair of casuals!
Great fit feels great just don’t like after a few washes it gets linty

Not my cup of tea and my choice of vernacular should only serve to highlight this fact.  Irregardless, the look of unexpected joy which crossed my Son's face when he opened his Birthday present and saw these was really special.  I'd recommend them as they are made of a heavier material than I expected....like a sweat pant material.  The fit was perfect, he's about 6 feet tall and 160 pounds....I'll have to buy him more as it seems he wants to wear these every day.  Luckily he takes them off to sleep so I can get them into the washer.

I love the design on a lot of the items in this brand, but the fit is just terrible. I am a fitness enthusiast, 6'2", 270, and these dont fit well at all. I ordered a XL pant, and they are WAY too tight in the thighs and seat, it seems like its between a medium and a large. I also ordered 2XL and 3XL tops, and there is no room at all in the shoulders, chest and back. This is not a baggy, urban kind of cut like you would expect from the brand styling, but more of a slim fit teenage look. i feel like i am going to burst through them just walking around or lifting my arms up. Also, the hoodie pocket just straight sucks. Its not a pocket so much as a tube of cheap material attached at the corners, and i feel like this would rip free just from putting your hands or phone in and out. I am really disappointed in these all around.
Got these for my son for Christmas and they're still going strong. Graphics in tact, no piling, not much or any initial shrinking, and true to sellers size description. Hard to beat that!
